alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN BOTTINEAU AND ROLETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles west of International Peace Garden to 9 miles north of Willow City. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dunseith and International Peace Garden around 515 PM CDT. Rolette around 530 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Lake Metigoshe State Park, Shell Valley, Homen State Forest, Butte St. Paul State Recreation Area, Omemee, Pelican Point State Recreation Area, Thorne and Overly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
